data.eml:eml: A revision of the genus Microlia Casey, 1910 (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae: Aleocharinae: Hoplandriini)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Gusarov, Vladimir I. (2002): A revision of the genus Microlia Casey, 1910 (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae: Aleocharinae: Hoplandriini). Zootaxa 34: 1-24, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.155781
